attributes.action: take action to end the Official and Unofficial Postal Strikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In South West London it has now been 9 days since any mail delivery has been received. The is impacting on the cash flow, costs and efficiency of staff. With wildcat strikes following on from official action and more rolling strikes starting next week it is unclear when we can expect normal service to return. It is essential action is taken to at least stop the strikes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
